sentences.sContent: Since masturbation can help you have babies, Saletan argues, it must also serve the "procreative and unitive purposes" described in the Catechism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since masturbation can help you have babies, Saletan argues, it must also serve the "procreative and unitive purposes" described in the Catechism.
sentences.sCn: 既然自慰能够有助于你生宝宝，塞尔坦论证到，它必定也能服务于“生产的、团结的目的”——这可是《教义问答书》所说的。

synos.tran: 生产的，生殖的；有生殖力的

trans.tranCn: 生产的，生殖的；有生殖力的
